alert.note: Alert for Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:03PM CDT until July 22 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST...EAST CENTRAL LIVINGSTON AND SOUTHERN TANGIPAHOA PARISHES... At 603 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Springfield to 7 miles southwest of Madisonville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ponchatoula, Springfield, Killian and W Lk Pontchartrain Buoy. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 13 and 25. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
